## ml_read_bundle

## Description
Loads an MLeap bundle into Spark


## Usage
```r
ml_read_bundle(sc, path)
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| sc | Spark connection |
| path | Path to the exported bundle zip file. |


## Value
An Spark ML Pipeline model object.
